text: He is at the bar instead of going home.

text: As far as I know, he is unemployed.

text: I missed the bus; otherwise I’d have been on time.

text: I didn’t find the way / I got lost; otherwise I’d have been on time.

text: The hotel was comfortable, but too expensive.

text: The older one gets, the more complacent one gets.
